document_data.name: Summon Undead III
document_data.mainbody: '''''Summon undead III''''', also known as '''''undead summoning III''''', was one of the series of ''[[summon undead]]'' spells available to arcane casters in the [[Forgotten Realms|Realms]].
document_data.Effects:
This spell could summon a huge [[skeleton]], a large [[zombie]], or a [[ghoul]]. Usually, the skeleton of an [[troll]] or an [[ogre zombie]] were chosen. As an alternative, the spell could summon one to three large skeletons, one to three medium-sized zombies, two to five medium-sized skeletons, or two to five small zombies—provided they were all within 30 feet of each other. 

If a ghoul was summoned, the spell was considered a [[:Category:Chaotic spells|chaotic spell]] in addition to an [[:Category:Evil spells|evil]] one.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a [[material component]], a piece of bone from either a [[ghast]], [[mummy]] or [[wight]].
document_data.History: This spell was known to be used by wizards of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
